subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: It can get pretty strange.
author: Zack Widup
full_text:
I hope so.  In that case things should get better soon.

I looked at that full moon for a while on a beautiful clear night the 
other day. I didn't see any UFO's this time, though.

Zack

On Wed, 23 Apr 2008, Stefan Bion wrote:

> Maybe it's just the fullmoon we had two days ago... :-)
